Content:: The 2021 Clásica de San Sebastián was a road cycling one-day race that took place on 31 July 2021 in San Sebastián, Spain. It was the 40th edition of the Clásica de San Sebastián and the twenty-second event of the 2021 UCI World Tour. It was won by Neilson Powless in a three way sprint. This cycling race article related to Spanish cycling is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
